resources.string:
The Water Quality App is a mobile app that provides users with up-to-date information on the quality of water. The app uses a variety of data sources, including historical data and machine learning, to provide accurate and timely predictions of water quality parameters such as pH, dissolved oxygen, temperature, and nutrient concentrations.

Features:
  • Predictions of water quality parameters.
  • Visualizations of water quality trends and patterns.
  • Information on the factors that affect water quality.

Benefits:
  • Improved water quality.
  • Reduced risk of waterborne diseases.
  • Increased public awareness of water quality issues.
  • Improved decision-making about water usage.
